ygData.subject: Re: Trouble connecting with server...........
ygData.msgSnippet: No increase in my lag, but I have had an increase in how often eq disconnects me. It went from maybe once a month to almost every time I log in. Usually after
ygData.messageBody:
No increase in my lag, but I have had an increase in how often eq
disconnects me. It went from maybe once a month to almost every time
I log in. Usually after the first disconnect my connection stays
solid for the rest of the evening.

I have had it stick my courser in the upper left corner at the
character select screen now. Never had that happen until the patch.
Hopefully today's patch fixes some of this.

Timmye Cousteau

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., "Drizzt do'Urden" <joeyis007@y...>
wrote:
> Ever since that last patch, I've been having seriously bad lag
> happening, where as before I had no lag, except for in the Bazaar.
> Now it doesn't matter where I'm at, it lags. This is unusual seeing
> as how I've been playing since July with no lag.
>
> Anyone having or had this problem?
